positive_examples: This is an example of simple sugar.
The simple sugar demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed simple sugar in this context.
A typical case of simple sugar would involve these features.
The concept of simple sugar applies here.
A monosaccharide or disaccharide carbohydrate that provides quick energy and has a sweet taste.
negative_examples: This is an example of starch, not simple sugar.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Starch, or other types of Carbohydrate

definition: A monosaccharide or disaccharide providing quick energy for organisms.
